LocaleFoodNutrientMapping._: Régional - Exporter le mapping des nutriments

LocaleFoodRankingUpload._: Régional - téléchargement du CSV de classement d'aliments
LocaleFoodRankingUpload.warningTitle: Warning: risk of data loss. Proceed with caution.
LocaleFoodRankingUpload.warningP1: The food frequency data is automatically updated by the system as new recalls are received.
LocaleFoodRankingUpload.warningP2: Uploading frequency data from a CSV file will override existing records in the database, potentially leading to data loss.
LocaleFoodRankingUpload.warningP3: This feature is intended only for initialising new locales or fixing issues with existing frequency data.
LocaleFoodRankingUpload.warningP4: Double-check that you are in the correct locale before uploading the data.

LocaleIndexBuild._: Locale - Rebuild Food Indexes for modified locales

SurveyNutrientsRecalculation._: Enquête - Carculer à nouveau les nutriments
